MAN.TITLE: setmenu

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a character string. The button name
: integer. The number of graphic window where the button is installed
: integer. The number of submenu to de-activate (if any). If button has no sub-menu, nsub is ignored

DESCRIPTION.P: The function allows the user to make active buttons or menus created by addmenu in the main or graphics windows command panels.

MAN.EXAMPLE: addmenu('foo') //New button made in main scilab window unsetmenu('foo') //button foo cannot be activated (grey string) setmenu('foo') //button foo can be activated (black string)
